data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Brentford's Mathias Jensen has been booked in London.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Ivan Toney is on target to give Brentford a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 55, Goal! Brentford extend their lead to 2-0 through Ivan Toney.
The away team replace Amadou Bakayoko with Jordan Shipley.
Sam McCallum is replacing Josh Pask for the away team.
In the minute 64, Brentford make their first substitution with Marcus Forss replacing Ivan Toney.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Vitaly Janelt replacing Emiliano Marcondes.
The home team have replaced Joshua Da Silva with Saman Ghoddos. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
In the minute 81, Ben Sheaf (Coventry) has received a yellow card from Andy Woolmer.
